jobDescription:
Mobile Cannabis Solutions is a cannabis farm staffing agency looking for RELIABLE full AND part-time employees! 
We offer flexibility and competitive industry pay rates. 

NOW HIRING FARM AND TRIM CREWS NOW! 


**COME FILL OUT HIRE PAPERWORK AND INTERVIEW THIS FRIDAY AND SATURDAY OCTOBER 27TH and 28TH!!**
WE ARE HIRING FRIDAY FROM 5:30PM-7PM AND SATURDAY FROM 3PM-4:30PM
COME MEET US AT 828 SOUTH CENTRAL AVENUE #7 MEDFORD OREGON 97501 



What you will need to fill out hire paperwork: 
Must have taken OLCC test http://www.oregon.gov/olcc/marijuana/Pages/mjworkerpermit.aspx
Bring a copy of the certified OLCC processing email stating a reference number
A pen
Readiness to interview and work 




Can you do outdoor labor?
Then farm work is for you!

Want to learn how to be a skilled trimmer?
We can help you learn how to trim.
You may be better at it than you think!

We work with multiple farms throughout Jackson and Josephine Counties, most often times, simultaneously. This gives you a selection of positions, and locations, to select from. 

Positions available: 
Immediate openings for Trim work and Farm work/Harvest
Additionally, we are staffing now for our Williams area

If you dont have your OLCC permit but would like to so you can join our team please follow the link below;
Click on the link below to get certified!! 

http://www.oregon.gov/olcc/marijuana/Pages/mjworkerpermit.aspx


Requirements:

Must be 21

• Must have taken and passed OLCC test and submitted your permit application (Please see link above to go through that quick and easy process)
• Must be punctual
• Must have a strong work ethic
• Must have a positive attitude
• Must work well in a team environment


Physical requirements:

•Must be able to trim -OR- do farm labor for 8+hours
• Must be able to sit, stand, and lift for long periods of time 


Position description for trim work: 

If you're new to the industry DON'T WORRY!! WE WILL TRAIN YOU!!

• Trim staff will be responsible for big leafing and dry trimming plants
• Responsible for moving/ hanging of plants, collecting waste plant matter, and properly disposing of dirt
• Separate and organize trimmed product into specific containers for bud, trim, stems, fan etc.
• Weigh and record information regarding trimmed plant material 
• Responsible for following operational and company guidelines 
• Ability to listen and communicate with other trim staff and management 
• Work in a quick and efficient manner while still being able to meet quality standards
• Maintain a clean and organized work environment
• Develop basic knowledge of strain characteristics and main problems with plants during harvest process
• Responsible for end of clean up of trim room, break room, and bathrooms and grow tables
• Abide by scheduling policies, show up on time for scheduled shifts, and request time off in accordance with company policy

PLUSES:
We do car pool to farms, but it is a plus if you have transportation (especially if you're willing and able to share in car pooling) 
Some experience in the cannabis industry is a plus as well.


Employees are paid weekly


As trim or farm staff, you will be directed to client locations and work to harvest their crop. This is a team environment so cooperation and friendliness are key. You will see various techniques and trim styles because we customize our services to each clients individual needs.
Again, WE WILL TRAIN YOU!

Mobile Cannabis Solutions
541-326-1643 between 9:00 A.M. - 5:00 P.M. 7 days a week

NOW HIRING FARM AND TRIM CREWS
jobApplication: Meet us to fill out hire paperwork
jobCompensation: $14 a hour for Farm Labor. $127 a pound for dry trim
